name: Kuboc
description:
Warning! This is a prototype. No tutorial, check CONTROLS section in the game FIRST! And it may contain bugs.

Controls

QWEASD - rotation, Arrows - movement, F - cycle colours, Space - fall.

Hit "FOLLOW" if you want this game to be finished.

The goal is to dig up and brake the shiny gold cubes.

When the fallen cubes touch two or more cubes of the same color they disappear.

Control

QWEASD - rotation

Arrows - movement

F - switch colours

Space - fall immediately

Plan features
  • Each level you can play in several modes: from relaxed to fast pace
  • Buffs and secrets
  • Creator mode
